TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IConventionElementTypeBuilder implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Builders.IConventionAnnotatableBuilder

summary.para: Provides a simple API surface for configuring an for a primitive collection from conventions.
This interface is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

Docs.remarks: See Model building conventions for more information and examples.

Docs.param: The converter to use.
Indicates whether the configuration was specified using a data annotation.
Docs.summary: Configures elements of the collection so their values are converted before writing to the database and converted back when reading from the database.
Docs.returns: The same builder instance if the configuration was applied, otherwise.
